title: [娱乐]BattlePets——宠物大作战！拥有一个带可视化界面的宠物插件吧[1.7x-1.9]
author: 不会再鸽了
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 20:38 编辑 



这是一款
玩家可以抓到生物，让它们自己的宠物
提升宠物等级的技能，也可以与其他玩家交易宠物PS:我只负责搬运介绍，该插件自行到https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/battlepets-free-source-code-will-be-free-whole-soon.14445/购买
插件支持版本
1.7-1.9
该插件目前是收费的
7欧元 = 51.1105人民币5英镑=47.6465人民币10美元=65.638人民币元作者以多次更改价格，大家赶紧购买吧！见好就收！
近期作者原贴没有声明要将插件麻烦发布
原作者原话:
The plugin shortly will be free

新接坑团队原话:
Hello,

This update is the first from the new development team "CosmosNode".
The plugin is still under the old developers account due to restrictions with premium resources on Spigot, the plugin transfer should be within the next 2 months.

This plugin update refactors the plugin under our name, cleans up the code as well as integrates maven.

原作者原话 不幸的是，我没有时间来经常更新这个插件。这就是我要免费发布插件的源代码的原因。你可以在服务器上使用这个插件，也可以继续开发这个插件。过几天我将上传插件的.jar文件给那些不会手动编译的人。我会试着继续修复bug并更新到最后一个版本，但那不会像以前一样那么快。 
感谢@andylizi提供的英译
Unfortunately, I don't have enough time to keep this plugin up to date. That's why I'm giving free source code for everyone. You can use it on your own servers and if you are dev, you can also contribute to this plugin. A bit later free .jar will be uploaded for those, who don't know how to compile it. I'll try to continue fixing bugs and updating to latest versions, but that won't be as fast as before.

介绍：
BattlePets是一个能给你的玩家带来全新的体验的插件，让他们不只能残忍的杀死那些怪物，还能跟它们成为朋♂友。玩家们可以用鸡蛋捕捉生物并教♂育它们，让它们变的非常非常牛逼，好帮你格斗。在宠物死后会回到玩家的背包，让玩家可以付出一定代价来重新复活。玩家们也可以与其他人用钱、物品来交♂易各自的宠物或互换。源码链接https://github.com/dariuskrtn/BattlePets
插件权限
玩家默认拥有权限宠物PVP权限：battlepets.battle.requestbattlepets.battle.accept不battlepets.battle.send把这3个给玩家就好了
插件指令/bp name 新名字重新命名你的宠物。
/bp menu
打开宠物菜单
/bp cancel
取消你的宠物攻击
/bp shop
打开宠物商店
/bp reload
重启插件
/bp egg 生物ID
给你指定类型的宠物蛋

配置文件

AllowedPets:#可捕捉宠物类型
- baby-villager
- magma_cube
- slime
- baby-wither
- wither
- bat
- block
- cave_spider
- chicken
- baby-chicken
- cow
- baby-cow
- creeper
- horse
- baby-horse
- iron_golem
- mushroom_cow
- baby-mushroom_cow
- ocelot
- pig
- baby-pig
- pig_zombie
- rabbit
- baby-rabbit
- sheep
- baby-sheep
- silverfish
- skeleton
- snowman
- spider
- villager
- baby-villager
- witch
- wolf
- baby-wolf
- zombie
- baby-zombie
CommandAliases:#自定义指令
- bp
- pets
AllWorldsAllowed: true#是否开启限制世界放置宠物
AllowedWorlds:#限制世界
- world_nether
PVPEnabled: true
MaxRadius: 15
RadiusFromWhereToFollow: 5
PetNameSize: 15
AllowPetsInTowny: true
WorldGuard:
  Enabled: false
  EnableSpawningByDefault: true
  ExceptionRegions:
  - spawn
MySQL:#数据库
  Enabled: false
  IP: localhost
  Port: 3306
  Username: root
  Password: ''
  Database: pluginas

replies.author: 凯文丶
replies.txt_content:
大哥，这插件都换团队来做了，自己看他们原话
Hello,

This update is the first from the new development team "CosmosNode".
The plugin is still under the old developers account due to restrictions with premium resources on Spigot, the plugin transfer should be within the next 2 months.

This plugin update refactors the plugin under our name, cleans up the code as well as integrates maven.
